description: I've downloaded today a bunch of files and everything was better than expected. Some other SD users seem to have found some issues. I am running the beta version of Steam OS currently FYI.

Mostly had been working well for me over the year & half been using it, except for 2 issue, one of which only recently happening:

- White Screen
Program is still working in background as can see it downloading, but only way to see what is going on is to Quit/Close it down.
Happens regularly. Could be downloading for few hours or minuites and will randomly kick in. 
Its been installed via Discover store, so unsure if theres a setting need to change. Definately isnt resolved by moving the app or minimising.

- Prewriting data can timeout 1fichier downloads
Unsure if still a issue, but for any larger downloads, the program used to premake the file (say a 20gb file) on the drive, then once completed, would start the download. Unfortunatly with 1fichier, once the url is grabbed the download needs to start within a number of secs.
Alas this way round, if have a big file thats being created, especialy on external storage like an SDcard, it may take way too long and timeout the download
But there aren't any tooltips to help navigate the UI
Modern and simple UI, stable, works great. Nothing to add.
but auto dark mode didn't work on fedora 35 (gnome wayland)
Great UI with features working as-advertised.
In my opinion, best looking torrent client, however, I've encountered a major issue - I wasn't able to download files to external drives.

I'm on Fedora Silverblue 37 and the app did not display on wayland, rather creating a completely invisible window. I had to temperarily switch over to x-org to make it work, which is annoying because I have other apps on my system that only work on wayland.

OS Name : Fedora Linux 38 (Workstation Edition)
OS Type : 64-bit
Gnome Version : 44.3
Windowing System : Wayland
Kernel Vesion : Linux 6.4.8-200.fc38.x86_64


If the specifications of your computer are similar to mine, this software will definitely work well.
I assume that this software uses daemons to manage tasks and downloads

The user interface has problems in changing the Theme

When I enter the settings, without making any changes, I want to return to the main page, it asks me "do you want to apply the settings?"

And since I haven't made any changes in the settings, I choose no
In this case, the software theme ( And maybe many settings ) will return to the default state.
Sadly this is a very unreliable software. Just trying to change a few settings crashed the app, and all my downloads (auth-based) had to start again.
Para quienes vienen de Windows, es una buena opción para el IDM.
Au démarrage, se déconnecte plusieurs fois. Ca ne me donne pas trop envie de poursuivre maheureusement alors qu'il est très simple comme je le voulais.
